title: To be of use poem as a whole

content.prompt: The poem as a whole is best understood as a

choices.label: plea for work to be less burdensome
vindication of the humanity of workers
celebration of earnest work and workers
defense of unusual types of work and workers

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
